title: U.S. To Scale Up Sanctions On Iran’s Key Financier China
summary: The U.S.’s short-term objective on Iran is for it to have zero enriched material that could be used to make a nuclear weapon. Its long-term objective is to remove from power the key element behind the drive for such armaments – the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC).
fullContent: The U.S.’s short-term objective on Iran is for it to have zero enriched material that could be used to make a nuclear weapon. Its long-term objective is to remove from power the key element behind the drive for such armaments – the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC). Its principal mechanism to achieve these aims is to deny Iran funding, and as the core of its financing comes from oil exports, the U.S. wants to cut these to as near to zero as possible. Cue China – the biggest importer of Iranian oil and therefore, in effect,…
